author: Special Correspondent
text:
The protesters raised slogans against the decision to ban jallikattu

A section of the people of Somarasampettai near Tiruchi on Thursday staging a protest along with the bulls in support of lifting the ban on jallikattu.— PHOTO: A. MURALITHARAN

Supporters of jallikattu continued with their protests on Thursday urging that the bull taming sport be allowed.

Agitations were held in Srirangam, Somarasampet, Gunaseelam, Thuvarankurichi, Pullambadi, Kallakudi, and Sirudhaiyur.

A group of people of Melur staged a protest in Srirangam urging that jallikattu be allowed.

The protest in Somarasampet was organised by the agricultural wing of the Tamil Maanila Congress.

The demonstrators raised slogans urging the government to promulgate an ordinance permitting jallikattu.
title: Jallikattu supporters continue with protests
